text: tatha jaan lo ki tum mein allaah ke rasool maujood hain. yadi, vah tumhaaree baat maanate rahe bahut-se vishay mein, to tum aapada mein pad jaoge. parantu, allaah ne priy bana diya hai tumhaare lie eemaan ko tatha sushobhit kar diya hai use tumhaare dilon mein aur apriy bana diya hai tumhaare lie kufr tatha ullanghan aur avagya ko aur yahee log sammaarg par hain
